t: Photos: New York City Mayor Eric Adams and the local community welcome an inspiring new office to Amazon’s New York Tech Hub
s: September 13, 2023 - Policymakers and community leaders celebrate the opening of ‘Hank,’ and welcome more than 2,000 Amazon employees to their new office.

t: Amazon Is Gobbling Up Midtown Office Space
s: 3 weeks ago - Amazon just bought a second Fifth Avenue office building, 522 Fifth, from Aby Rosen’s RFR. It has also leased nearly a million square feet of office space in Midtown East in the last six months.

t: Photos: Look inside Amazon's newest NYC office, a restored city landmark that is also helping to revitalize Midtown
s: September 12, 2023 - Amazon restored many of the unique architectural features found at one of the first department stores in the country.

t: See Amazon's new NYC office at historic Lord & Taylor building
s: September 14, 2023 - A $92 million condo at 432 Park Avenue in Midtown Manhattan has entered contract, the biggest deal of the year in New York City so far. The five-bedroom apartment on the skyscraper's 79th floor first hit the market in September 2021 for $135 million but underwent a significant price cut this ...

t: News | Amazon inks one of Manhattan’s largest office leases this year at HSBC's former US home
s: April 17, 2025 - Tech giant commits to 330,000 square feet at 10 Bryant Park, near its New York flagship

t: Amazon Expands With 112K SF Manhattan Lease In Another WeWork Partnership
s: February 11, 2025 - Amazon expands in Manhattan with a 112K SF lease in partnership with WeWork to optimize office space without long-term commitment.

t: Amazon Taking Another 200K SF Of Manhattan Office Space
s: March 10, 2025 - The deal is the second sizable Manhattan office lease signed by the tech giant so far this year, as it calls its employees back to the office five days a week.

t: Amazon Jobs, Employment in Manhattan, NY | Indeed

t: MAEN Watches - Designed with eye for quality
s: At MAEN Watches we have a simple vision, we want to offer the best quality for reasonable prices. We like to keep an open mind and design unique timepieces with a hint of the past but the technology of today. Our goal is to create watches that exceed expectations.
